description: **Current Issues:** - Multiple JSON reads/writes for user history, KB metadata, sessions, providers - No caching layer for frequently accessed configs - Synchronous file operations block agent workflows **Optimizations:** - Implement in-memory cache with TTL for `user_history.json`, `llm_providers.json`, `embedding_providers.json` - Use async file I/O (`aiofiles`) for large knowledge base operations - Batch writes to reduce disk I/O (buffer changes, flush periodically)
title: 1. File I/O Optimization

descriptionHistory.description: **Current Issues:** - Multiple JSON reads/writes for user history, KB metadata, sessions, providers - No caching layer for frequently accessed configs - Synchronous file operations block agent workflows **Optimizations:** - Implement in-memory cache with TTL for `user_history.json`, `llm_providers.json`, `embedding_providers.json` - Use async file I/O (`aiofiles`) for large knowledge base operations - Batch writes to reduce disk I/O (buffer changes, flush periodically)
